title: BAClib If-Extensible Applicator
description: Conditional schema that applies when the base type is 'bitstring', 'enumerated', or 'choice'. Defines properties for extensibility including the 'extensible' flag, valid value ranges, and custom value ranges.

extensible.description: Indicates whether the enumerated type is extensible, allowing for additional values beyond those explicitly defined.

ranges.description: Optional array of ranges defining valid value segments for the enumerated type.

custom.description: Indicates if this range is for custom (user-defined) values.

minimum.description: The minimum value of the range (inclusive).

maximum.description: The maximum value of the range (inclusive).
